channel.title: CVE Feed for MadrasThemes -- MAS Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MadrasThemes -- MAS Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-49233|2024-10-18T13:30:29.514Z -- madrasthemes -- mas%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MadrasThemes MAS Elementor allows DOM-Based XSS.This issue affects MAS Elementor: from n/a through 1.1.6.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MadrasThemes MAS Elementor allows DOM-Based XSS.This issue affects MAS Elementor: from n/a through 1.1.6.
